meta.job_title: Program Manager, Global Customer Quality Strategy

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute global customer quality strategies in alignment with internal business objectives and regulations.
Lead and manage cross-functional global programs for new product launches and quality improvement.
Drive support and change management for customer quality programs with executive leadership.
Directly lead a team of Data Analysts supporting customer quality initiatives.
Collaborate with finance and HR on program spend and resource needs.
Implement strategies for continuous improvement of Customer Quality Operations.
Serve as a Core leadership team member reporting directly to the Executive director global customer quality strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in medical, engineering, or scientific discipline (Master's preferred)
